venue.name: Myles Standish State Forest South Line Gate

item.description:
Frogfoot Reservoir hike starting from the gate at the end of the section of Charge Pond Road that comes off Route 28 in Wareham  (Not through the park. You can't get there through the park unless you want a warmup hike of a couple of miles in order to meet us.)

The plan, as I understand it, is to do a one-way hike through Makepeace land down to Tihonet Village.

I don't have a good estimate for the distance. Last week, Frank Werny made a 6 mile hike out of it. (Perhaps Malcolm can give us a better estimate.)

Meet us at 8:30AM at the Mill Pond Diner on Route 28 if you want to have breakfast with us. (The Mill Pond diner is on Route 28 near the old Tremont Nail Factory and the official street address is 2571 Cranberry Highway, Wareham, MA)

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Frogfoot Reservoir
